candidates.title: Update ash to `0.35`
candidates.body:
Hopefully they don't start releasing breaking versions every week.

**Testing**
Ran some examples

candidates.title: Release core-0.12.1 and hal-0.12.1
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Includes #2303, #2305, #2307, #2308, #2313, #2314, #2321

**Description**
A few important fixes here, Metal push constants, and the clearing of textures with render passes.

**Testing**
Loosely tested on the examples.

candidates.title: Update naga to 8df5421
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Picks up https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1616

**Description**
Fixes the shadow example on GL backend

**Testing**
Locally

candidates.title: Update ash to 0.34
candidates.body:
**Connections**
`ash` changelog: https://github.com/MaikKlein/ash/releases/tag/0.34.0

**Description**
Update `ash` from `0.33` to `v0.34`.
`ash` can now link to vulkan at compile time (and does so by default), but this PR keeps the old behavior for now.

**Testing**
Ran tests and some examples with Vulkan backend.

candidates.title: Release 0.12
candidates.body:
**Connections**
https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1610

**Description**
Mostly a maintenance release

**Testing**
In progress

candidates.title: Remove block decorations
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Takes https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1581

**Description**
WGSL got a little bit nicer to use

**Testing**
Examples

candidates.title: hal/gles: support ASTC, fix WebGL extensions for compressed formats
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Blocked by https://github.com/grovesNL/glow/pull/198
Switches glow to github (! be careful when backporting to 0.11)

**Description**
Turns out, ETC2 is a part of GLES3 but not guaranteed on WebGL2.
This PR makes our backend query for proper extensions, and with it we support ASTC LDR.

**Testing**
Tested on skybox example on WebGL, which is now fixed 🎉

candidates.title: Update naga with Metal bounds checks
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Brings https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1532 and https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1581
Blocked by https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/issues/1585

**Description**
Big shader update

**Testing**

candidates.title: Angle support on Windows
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Follow-up to #2256
Partially addresses the need to target DX11

**Description**
Makes our GLES/EGL backend be compatible with Angle, thus running on more platforms (e.g. anything not supporting Vulkan and DX12).

TODO:
- [x] make it work
- [x] remove `backends_map!` entirely
- [x] find a way to make the GLES backend optional

**Testing**
Tested on vange-rs

candidates.title: Update naga to c69f676
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Picks up https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1571 and other things

**Description**
Improves our GLES-3.0 support.

**Testing**
On vange-rs

**Description**
Just a big fat patch release!

**Testing**
Local on examples.

candidates.title: Update raw-window-handle to 0.4

**Description**
Update `raw-window-handle` to 0.4. 

~~Blocked by new `winit` release with https://github.com/rust-windowing/winit/pull/1957.~~

candidates.title: Add multiview support
candidates.body:
## Connections
Fixes: https://github.com/gfx-rs/wgpu/issues/2186

## Description
Adds basic multiview support.

## Testing
You can now create a render pass with a target view with two array layers.

**Testing**
examples

candidates.title: Pretty validation errors from Naga
candidates.body:
**Connections**
Follow-up to #2140, which changed only commented out code (oops)
Depends on https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1500
Depends on https://github.com/brendanzab/codespan/issues/340

**Description**
Actually brings in the new error logic, while updating Naga to 323999f

**Testing**
```
[2021-11-01T20:37:27Z ERROR wgpu::backend::direct] Handling wgpu errors as fatal by default
thread 'main' panicked at 'wgpu error: Validation Error

Caused by:
    In Device::create_shader_module
    
Shader validation error: 
   ┌─ :38:87
   │  
38 │       out.world_normal = mat3x3<f32>(w.x.xyz, w.y.xyz, w.z.xyz) * vec3<f32>(normal.xyz);
   │ ╭──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────^
39 │ │     out.world_position = world_pos.xy;
   │ │                         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ naga::Expression [24]
   │ ╰──────────────────────^ naga::Expression [23]


    Entry point vs_main at Vertex is invalid
    Store of [24] into [23] doesn't have matching types

', wgpu/src/backend/direct.rs:2211:5
```

candidates.body:
**Connections**
Picks up https://github.com/gfx-rs/naga/pull/1470

**Description**
This is critical for development, since shader validation errors are cryptic otherwise.

**Testing**
Untested
